column4: Based on your clinical context, self-report and inventory scores summary, I can provide some helpful insights. It appears that you may be experiencing symptoms of depression as indicated by your score on the PHQ-4 questionnaire, which is a commonly used tool to screen for depression. However, it's important to note that these are just initial assessments and should not replace professional diagnosis or treatment. I recommend seeking help from a mental health clinician who can provide more comprehensive evaluation and support.
